content: **written pattern for size s/m is free on my blog ** **ad-free written crochet pattern with stitches diagram for multiple sizes 2xs to 2xl is available as an instant download pdf file for your convenience ** bust size 2xs/xs 26 to 28 inches s/m 30 to 34 inches l 36 to 38 inches xl 40 to 42 inches 2xl 44 to 46 inches
